title: MemoriesOnTv V.4.04 + serial
description:
MemoriesOnTV is a powerful yet simple to use slideshow creator. Designed with ease-of-use in mind, MemoriesOnTV helps you whip up interesting slideshows quickly and effortlessly.

Add beautiful and elegant effects to your slideshows. We focus on the QUALITY of the effects instead of the QUANTITY. Our Ken Burns-styled panning and zooming effects has been refined over the years since we first introduced it to the consumer slideshow market. All these mean that you have the best and most professional looking effects at your finger tips.

Choose to burn your slideshow onto a video disc (VCD, SVCD or DVD) for play back on ordinary DVD players. No more squeezing in front of a computer monitor to showcase your pictures. The slideshow can be enjoyed on a big screen in the comfort of the living room.
